terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content: By accessing or using Tome, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.<return></return><return></return><title>1. About Tome</title>Tome is a platform that allows users to read children's books and create their own books using artificial intelligence technology.<return></return><return></return><title>2. Eligibility and Account</title>- The Service is available to users of all ages<return></return>- Users under the age of 13 (or 16 in certain jurisdictions) should have parental or guardian supervision when using the Service<return></return>- You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials<return></return>- You must provide accurate information when creating an account<return></return><return></return><title>3. Service Features</title>Free Tier:<return></return>- One (1) free AI-generated book creation per account<return></return><return></return>Subscription Tier:<return></return>- Monthly subscription provides regular credits for creating additional books<return></return>- Credits are allocated monthly and do not roll over to subsequent months unless otherwise specified<return></return><return></return><title>4. Payment Terms</title>- Subscriptions are billed monthly<return></return>- You may cancel your subscription at any time, but no refunds will be provided for partial months<return></return>- Payment information is processed through third-party payment providers<return></return>- All sales are final and non-refundable<return></return><return></return><title>5. Content Creation and AI</title>- All book content is generated by artificial intelligence<return></return>- Users provide themes, preferences, and character information to guide the AI<return></return>- Users cannot manually edit generated story text<return></return>- The AI may occasionally produce unexpected results. You are responsible for reviewing generated content before making it public<return></return><return></return><title>6. Content Ownership</title>Your Created Content:<return></return>- You retain ownership rights to books you create using the Service<return></return>- You may publish, distribute, or sell your AI-created books on other platforms<return></return>- By making your books public on Tome, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to display and distribute your content on the Platform<return></return><return></return>Other Users' Content:<return></return>- Books created by other users and shared publicly may be read but not copied, reproduced, or distributed outside the Platform<return></return><return></return><title>7. Privacy Settings</title>- Books can be set as public (visible to all users) or private (visible only to you)<return></return>- You may edit privacy settings at any time<return></return>- You may delete your books at any time<return></return>- Account deletion will remove your private books but may retain public books already shared on the Platform<return></return><return></return><title>8. User Conduct and Content Guidelines</title>Users agree NOT to:<return></return>- Use inappropriate, offensive, or illegal usernames or display names<return></return>- Submit inappropriate prompts or character names to the AI<return></return>- Attempt to manipulate the AI to generate inappropriate content<return></return>- Share or distribute books containing inappropriate or illegal content<return></return>- Upload or create content that infringes on others' intellectual property rights<return></return>- Attempt to abuse, exploit, or hack the Service<return></return>- Share account credentials with others<return></return><return></return>Tome reserves the right to remove content or terminate accounts that violate these guidelines without notice or refund.<return></return><return></return><title>9. Intellectual Property</title>- The Tome platform, including its AI technology, design, and features, is owned by Tome<return></return>- The Tome name, logo, and branding are trademarks of Tome<return></return>- User-generated content belongs to users as described in Section 6<return></return><return></return><title>10. Parental Responsibility</title>Parents and guardians are responsible for monitoring their children's use of the Service. Tome does not actively monitor user age or require parental consent. Parents should review content created by or accessed by their children.<return></return><return></return><title>11. Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability</title>TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY SWISS LAW:<return></return>- The Service is provided "AS IS" without warranties of any kind<return></return>- Tome is not liable for any content created or shared by users<return></return>- Tome does not guarantee the accuracy, quality, or appropriateness of AI-generated content<return></return>- Tome is not responsible for any damages, losses, or harm resulting from use of the Service<return></return>- Tome does not guarantee continuous, error-free, or secure operation of the Service<return></return>- Total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the Service in the past 12 months<return></return><return></return><title>12. Third-Party Services</title>The Service may integrate with third-party services including payment processors and AI providers. Your use of such services is subject to their respective terms and policies. Tome is not responsible for third-party services.<return></return><return></return><title>13. Termination</title>- You may terminate your account at any time through account settings<return></return>- We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms<return></return>- Upon termination, your right to use the Service ceases immediately<return></return>- No refunds will be provided upon termination<return></return>- We reserve the right to delete inactive accounts after prolonged periods of inactivity<return></return><return></return><title>14. Modifications to Terms</title>- We may update these Terms at any time without prior notice<return></return>- Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms<return></return>- Material changes will be notified through the App or via email when possible<return></return>- It is your responsibility to review the Terms periodically<return></return><return></return><title>15. Dispute Resolution and Governing Law</title>- These Terms are governed by the laws of Switzerland<return></return>- Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Valais, Switzerland<return></return>- You agree to attempt good-faith resolution before pursuing legal action<return></return><return></return><title>16. Severability</title>If any provision of these Terms is found unenforceable or invalid, the remaining provisions remain in full effect.<return></return><return></return><title>17. No Endorsement</title>Tome does not endorse, verify, or guarantee the accuracy of user-generated content. Views expressed in user-created books do not represent Tome' opinions or beliefs.<return></return><return></return><title>18. Language</title>These Terms are provided in multiple languages for your convenience. In case of conflicts between translations, the English version shall prevail. By using the Service, you confirm you understand the Terms in at least one provided language.<return></return><return></return><title>19. Contact</title>For questions, concerns, or support:<return></return>Email: tome.app@gmail.com<return></return>Website: https://tome.app

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Tome ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our Service.<return></return><return></return><title>1. Information We Collect</title>Account Information:<return></return>- Email address (for account creation and communication)<return></return>- Username or display name<return></return>- Password (encrypted)<return></return>- Account creation date<return></return><return></return>Payment Information:<return></return>- Payment information is processed by third-party payment providers<return></return>- We do not store full credit card or banking details<return></return>- We may store transaction history and subscription status<return></return><return></return>Content Data:<return></return>- Books you create (text, images, metadata)<return></return>- AI prompts and preferences you submit<return></return>- Privacy settings for your books (public or private)<return></return>- Books you read or interact with<return></return><return></return>Technical Information:<return></return>- Device type and operating system<return></return>- App version<return></return>- IP address<return></return>- Usage statistics and crash reports<return></return>- Log files and error messages<return></return><return></return><title>2. How We Use Your Information</title>We use collected information to:<return></return>- Provide and maintain the Service<return></return>- Process your subscription and payments<return></return>- Generate AI-powered books based on your inputs<return></return>- Store and display your created books<return></return>- Communicate with you about your account and the Service<return></return>- Improve and optimize the Service<return></return>- Detect and prevent fraud or abuse<return></return>- Comply with legal obligations<return></return><return></return><title>3. AI and Data Processing</title>- Your prompts and inputs are processed by artificial intelligence systems<return></return>- AI providers may process your data according to their own privacy policies<return></return>- We do not use your personal information to train AI models without consent<return></return>- Generated content is stored on our servers<return></return><return></return><title>4. Information Sharing</title>We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:<return></return><return></return>Third-Party Service Providers:<return></return>- Payment processors (for subscription billing)<return></return>- AI service providers (for book generation)<return></return>- Cloud hosting services (for data storage)<return></return>- Analytics providers (for Service improvement)<return></return><return></return>Public Content:<return></return>- Books you set as "public" are visible to all users<return></return>- Your username may be displayed with public books<return></return><return></return>Legal Requirements:<return></return>- We may disclose information if required by law<return></return>- To protect our rights, safety, or property<return></return>- To investigate fraud or violations of our Terms<return></return><return></return><title>5. Data Storage and Security</title>- Your data is stored on secure servers<return></return>- We use industry-standard encryption for sensitive data<return></return>- Passwords are encrypted and not accessible to us<return></return>- We cannot guarantee absolute security but take reasonable measures to protect your information<return></return><return></return><title>6. Children's Privacy</title>- The Service is available to users of all ages<return></return>- We do not knowingly collect more information from children than necessary to provide the Service<return></return>- Parents and guardians are responsible for monitoring their children's use<return></return>- Parents may request access to or deletion of their child's data by contacting us<return></return><return></return><title>7. Your Rights</title>Under Swiss and European data protection law, you have the right to:<return></return>- Access your personal information<return></return>- Correct inaccurate information<return></return>- Delete your account and associated data<return></return>- Export your data in a portable format<return></return>- Withdraw consent for data processing<return></return>- Object to certain types of processing<return></return>- Lodge a complaint with data protection authorities<return></return><return></return>To exercise these rights, contact us at tome.app@gmail.com<return></return><return></return><title>8. Data Retention</title>- We retain your information for as long as your account is active<return></return>- After account deletion, we delete your personal information within 30 days<return></return>- Public books may be retained after account deletion unless specifically requested for removal<return></return>- Some information may be retained longer for legal or security purposes<return></return>- Anonymized data may be retained for analytics<return></return><return></return><title>9. Cookies and Tracking</title>- We may use cookies and similar technologies to improve the Service<return></return>- Cookies help us remember your preferences and login status<return></return>- You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect functionality<return></return>- We do not use advertising or tracking cookies<return></return><return></return><title>10. Third-Party Links</title>- The Service may contain links to third-party websites or services<return></return>- We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third parties<return></return>- We encourage you to review their privacy policies<return></return><return></return><title>11. International Data Transfers</title>- Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside Switzerland<return></return>- We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers<return></return>- By using the Service, you consent to such transfers<return></return><return></return><title>12. Marketing Communications</title>- We may send you service-related emails (account updates, changes to Terms, etc.)<return></return>- You cannot opt out of service-related communications<return></return>- We do not send marketing emails unless you opt in<return></return>- You can unsubscribe from marketing emails at any time<return></return><return></return><title>13. Changes to This Privacy Policy</title>- We may update this Privacy Policy at any time<return></return>- Material changes will be notified through the App or via email<return></return>- Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance<return></return>- The "Last Updated" date will reflect when changes were made<return></return><return></return><title>14. Data Controller</title>The data controller responsible for your information is:<return></return>Tome<return></return>https://tome.app<return></return><return></return><title>15. Contact Us</title>For questions, concerns, or requests regarding your privacy or this Privacy Policy:<return></return>Email: https://tome.app<return></return>Website: tome.app@gmail.com<return></return><return></return>For data protection inquiries in Switzerland, you may also contact:<return></return>Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)<return></return>Website: www.edoeb.admin.ch

register.title: Welcome to Tome!
register.body: Thank you for joining Tome! You can now create your first book for free using our AI-powered tools. Explore our library of children's books or start creating your own magical stories. Click the link below to get started.

forgot-password.title: Reset your Tome password
forgot-password.body: We received a request to reset your password. Please click on the link below to create a new password.
forgot-password.click: Click here to reset your password
forgot-password.warning: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your account remains secure.
forgot-password.link: You can also copy and paste this link into your browser:

receipt.title: Tome Receipt
receipt.body: Congratulations on purchasing on Tome! You can download your invoice below.
receipt.downloadBooks: Your eBooks are ready to download:
